title: Startup Founders Podcast – Episode 9
content: This week, I'm very excited not have two co-founders on the show to talk about their startup! Carlos González de Villaumbrosia and Álvaro Sanmartín, are the co-founders of Floqq, a startup that's focused on changing education through online video courses in Spanish, English, and Portuguese. In this interview, they talk about building the right team, coming to the US from Spain, and what excites them about education tech. You can follow them on Twitter @AlvaroSanmartin and @Villaumbrosia. Listen to the show now: iTunes (click "subscribe" to get episode 9) Stitcher RSS Feed Don't forget to rate us on iTunes and share the show with your friends! You can send questions, feedback, and comments to me on Twitter @markjsaldana. I'll be back next Friday with with another episode.
